conclusion: Analyze the flow path of the liquid from entry points A, B, C, and D through the baffles.
A is at the top left.
B is next to A, slightly to the right.
C is to the right of B.
D is at the top right.
Liquid from A flows down, encounters the first baffle (pink), is directed left, and enters container E.
Liquid from B flows down, hits the second baffle (gray), is directed left, and enters container E.
Liquid from C flows down, hits the third baffle (cyan), is directed right, and enters container F.
Liquid from D flows down, hits the fourth baffle (white), is directed right, and enters container F.
Liquids from A and B flow into container E.
Liquids from C and D flow into container F.
Container E will receive liquid from A and B.
Container F will receive liquid from C and D.
